conversation.speaker: Blur Sotong
conversation.text: What's this LLM Apps using Nemobot thingy all about? Sounds like some futuristic robot.

conversation.speaker: Chao Mugger
conversation.text: Haha, it does sound a bit sci-fi! LLM stands for Large Language Models, which are a type of artificial intelligence that processes and generates human-like text. Nemobot SaaS is a platform or service that helps you create applications using these models.

conversation.speaker: Blur Sotong
conversation.text: Why do they even call it software as a service? Sounds pretty fancy for just using software.

conversation.speaker: Chao Mugger
conversation.text: Well, "Software as a Service" or SaaS is a way of delivering applications over the internet as a service rather than having them installed locally. It allows users to access software via a subscription or pay-as-you-go model, so they don't need to worry about things like infrastructure or updates.

conversation.speaker: Blur Sotong
conversation.text: So, this is for their Bachelor of Engineering project, right? Why are they studying LLMs at all?

conversation.speaker: Chao Mugger
conversation.text: Right, this is part of their degree requirement. They study LLMs because it's a rapidly growing field in AI that has many practical applications, like chatbots, translation services, and even creativity tools. Understanding LLMs helps in developing more intelligent and interactive software.

conversation.speaker: Blur Sotong
conversation.text: Why are they using something called Nemobot though? Can't they just use any software to work with LLMs?

conversation.speaker: Chao Mugger
conversation.text: Nemobot probably provides a user-friendly and efficient way to implement LLMs into applications. It might have some features or integrations that make it easier for developers, particularly students, to work with complex models without re-inventing the wheel.

conversation.speaker: Blur Sotong
conversation.text: This stuff sounds really cool but overwhelming at the same time. Is this kind of technology the future?

conversation.speaker: Chao Mugger
conversation.text: Absolutely, it’s a big part of the future of tech. As more applications start using AI for improved user experiences, understanding and working with technologies like LLMs will be very important. It's fascinating and a bit overwhelming, but it’s also very exciting to be involved in.
